headline.main: REICH PEACE PLEA IN THE WINTER SEEN; Success of Soviet Offensive, Allied Political Unity Held Impelling Reasons

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Nov. 1 -- The smashing success of the Russian offensive now threatening the destruction of at least forty German divisions along the lower reaches of the Dnieper River has moved one of the best-informed sources on the Eastern military situation to admit today that it is possible the German Army will be defeated so decisively on the Eastern Front this winter that the Reich will sue for peace.
abstract: USSR gains revd; London sources see possible decisive Ger defeat this Winter
